title: Swiss Re says helped insure Boeing, Ethiopian Airlines
description: Reinsurance group Swiss Re helped cover jetmaker Boeing Co and Ethiopian Airlines, the Swiss company said on Monday amid an investigation into what caused an Ethiopian Airlines plane crash that killed 157 people.

title: Canada re-examining MAX approval after FAA certification probe

title: Algeria suspends all Boeing 737 MAX 8 and 9 flights - Ennahar TV
description: Algeria's civil aviation authority has suspended all flight operations of Boeing 737 MAX 8 and 9 planes as a precautionary measure following the Ethiopian Airlines plane crash, Ennahar TV reported on Monday.
